name: StayBeyond
slogan: Handpicked family homes across the UK
description:
StayBeyond is transforming the way families and groups travel. We’re merging the comfort, luxury and ease of a home rental, with the 5-star convince and hospitality of a hotel stay. Our guest can rent one-of-a-kind homes in the best neighbourhoods, and find the same standard of quality and care inside. Crisp white linens and fluffy towels, 24/7 concierge, high-end home amenities and bath essentials are all just a turn-key away. 

In just a few years, StayBeyond has grown from just a handful of properties in, to a quickly expanding business that’s transforming how families spend their time away. Be part of this growing community and join the StayBeyond team.

team.title: Co-Founder
team.name: Jeremy Cortial
team.bioHtml: Founder @StayBeyond, @yellowpop • founded @DripApp, @Tornado

team.name: Andrew Lynn
team.bioHtml: Help Start-up's grow by attracting and hiring very best talent. Specialize in Talent Planning, Talent Acquisition, Recruitment Process, Company Culture.

jobs.title: Senior Software Engineer Angular / Java
jobs.description:
Who are we?

StayBeyond is transforming the way families and groups travel. We’re merging the comfort, luxury and ease of a home rental, with the 5-star convince and hospitality of a hotel stay. Our guest can rent one-of-a-kind homes in the best neighbourhoods, and find the same standard of quality and care inside. Crisp white linens and fluffy towels, 24/7 concierge, high-end home amenities and bath essentials are all just a turn-key away. 

In just a few years, StayBeyond has grown from just a handful of properties in, to a quickly expanding business that’s transforming how families spend their time away. Be part of this growing community and join the StayBeyond team. 


Who we are looking for

The most important thing for any new member of the StayBeyond team to know is that you’re joining a startup. We are small and growing. There’s a lot do. Everyone is confident, honest, collaborative, seeks out big contributions, and is willing to do what is needed whether complex or mundane. We’re building a hospitality brand based on honesty and excellence, and that starts with our own behaviour.

If that sounds like you, then we’d love to hear from you.

We are looking for a Java / Angular developer with a keen interest in working in a startup environment. 

You’ll be working with our team of remote developers and we’ll be working on both Front-end and Back office. 

Our front-end and back-end applications are built using:

Angular 4 and JAVA EE 8 


Everything needed for an up and coming developer wanting to get hands on experience with the latest trends and technologies.

Key responsibilities within this role include:

•	Working as part of our skilled team, designing and developing high-volume, low-latency applications delivering high-availability and performance.
•	Delivering a front end solution with a focus on UX and making the customer experience second to none.
•	Ensuring high performance on mobile and desktop.
•	Writing well designed, testable, documented and efficient code.
•	Create prototypes to help test new technologies / user interface patterns.
•	Ensure all work delivered has quality built in using automation test frameworks
•	Participate in software design reviews, code reviews, etc. to ensure solutions are designed to meet business needs.
•	Prepare and produce releases of software components.
•	Working on defining and implementing new feature
Skills Required
•	Ideally hold a BS/MS degree in Computer Science, Engineering or a related subject.
•	Solid knowledge of AngularJS practices and commonly used modules.
•	Hands-on Software Development experience
•	An artistic flair for page presentation
•	Creating self-contained, reusable, and testable modules and components.
•	Extremely strong analytical and problem solving skills.
•	Good verbal and written communication skills


Benefits

- Competitive salary
- Meritocratic environment - we're a startup and we'll all share the rewards of our success
- Excellent WeWork environment including superb facilities such as free micro-brew coffee, breakout areas, talks & activities and more
- Ability to stay in any of our properties for free
